#Text=Make Artwork More Realistic
#Text=Realistic artworks are works of art that looks cool .
#Text=This article provides guidance on how to make any artwork more realistic .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Pick the artwork you want to make more realistic .
#Text=For example , an image of a snake .
#Text=This will be your " base " artwork .

column3:

7-7	275-276

column1: #Text=It could take some time to get it perfect if you 're drawing it from scratch .
#Text=Try using shapes to get the base perfect .
#Text=Use a circle for the head and eyes ( Half circle for Evil eyes , oval for the body , etc. )
#Text=Make sure to add two lines to get the face right .
#Text=Create some texture in your art .
#Text=For a lion , make it look furry , A snake or fish will be scaly , a bird will be feathery .
#Text=Some animals or things can have more than one texture .
#Text=Try many different kinds of textures .
#Text=Add some shading .
#Text=Think of where the light would be .
#Text=If it 's coming from behind , the front would be darker then behind .
#Text=If it 's in front , the back would be a bit darker then the front .
#Text=Try to think of it as a shadow .
#Text=Include some interesting effects to the art .
#Text=Like glowing eyes , a slight glow , magic or flames , for example .
#Text=This will add in some details to the drawing .
#Text=Plus , it would look cool and neat .
#Text=For most effects , you can use an oil brush , a big paintbrush or a water brush .
#Text=This will add some realistic effects to the artwork .
#Text=If you are creating an artwork using a computer programme , these brushes may be tools or options in the programme .
#Text=This can also apply to water to make it look real .
#Text=Like a reflection .
#Text=Take a look at the art work .
#Text=If it looks real , It 's done . ( Unless you want to add backgrounds )
#Text=Add in a background ( optional ) .
#Text=This will make the artwork more enjoyable and add a bit of scenery .
#Text=Make sure to add some depth to the artwork ( Optional ) .
#Text=This can be things like small object in the back , big objects in front , this kind of idea .
#Text=Submit the artwork online .
#Text=You can use Devintart or any online art sites for it .
#Text=Others can see it if you decide to do so .
#Text=Just make sure to add your signature onto it to prevent art theft .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Take some time .
#Text=Huge artworks are n't usually finished within a day .
#Text=It can take weeks or even months to get it done .
#Text=Always save your work .
#Text=You do n't want to start all over again from scratch , do you ?
#Text=You can always watch other artists draw artwork .
#Text=This can help you make a good art work later on .
#Text=If doing it in real life , make sure to let the painting dry before sending it .
#Text=Make sure to get the shapes right or it 'll look weird and cartoony .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't steal other peoples work .
#Text=Nobody likes art theft .
#Text=Always remember to save or you could lose all the hard work on your art .
#Text=If you found out someone stole your work , report it .
#Text=Do n't add in too many elements .
#Text=Put in a little bit of elements to make it real .
#Text=Take time .
#Text=Do n't rush .
#Text=It can take weeks or months to finish .
#Text=Always remember the Rules of thirds .
#Text=This will help with making any artworks real or not .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Laptop ( If your doing a digital artwork )
#Text=Paper ( If your doing a drawing or painting )
#Text=Pencil
#Text=Colored pencils
#Text=Eraser
